description:
Fujiko Mine, a mysterious woman who claims to be Fujiko’s aunt, gives Lupin an ultimatum: Find Marshal Rommel’s lost gold or die! First, Lupin must decipher the location of the gold, written in ancient hieroglyphs. Will Lupin be able to locate the golden treasure? Time is running out!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Une sorcière de la quatrième dimension
